story.text: Originally a traditional methodology kind of guy, I've become a convert to the cause of [[Extreme Programming]]. My current role is XP advocate at Khatovar Technology ([http://www.khatovartech.com www.khatovartech.com]), providing XP services in the Asia Pacific region.
Steve was responsible for the introduction of XP to the Credit Technology area of [[Goldman Sachs]] and coached the team for over a year.
Prior to that Steve worked extensively in Smalltalk and developing financial software (and often both at the same time).
He and his wife Amanda live in Melbourne, Australia.
